mapper.insert: insert into CHAGE_REQUEST (CHANGE_NUM, MEMBERIDX, ITEM_CODE, CHANGE_REQUEST, CHANGE_STATE, CHANGED_DATE) values (SEQ_CHANGE_REQUEST.nextval, #{memberIdx}, #{itemCode}, #{changeRequest}, #{changeState}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select CHANGE_NUM as changeNum, memberIdx as memberIdx, ITEM_CODE as itemCode, CHANGE_REQUEST as changeRequest, CHANGE_STATE as changeState, CHANGED_DATE as changeDate from CHAGE_REQUEST where MEMBERIDX = #{memberIdx} and ITEM_CODE = #{itemCode}

select CHANGE_NUM as changeNum, c.memberIdx as memberIdx, c.ITEM_CODE as itemCode, CHANGE_REQUEST as changeRequest, CHANGE_STATE as changeState, CHANGED_DATE as changeDate, o.ORDER_CODE as orderCode, p.THUMBNAIL, p.ITEM, s.BRANDNAME as brandName from CHAGE_REQUEST c LEFT JOIN ORDER_ITEM o ON c.ITEM_CODE = o.ITEM_CODE LEFT JOIN PRODUCT p ON p.PRODUCTCODE = o.PRODUCTCODE LEFT JOIN SELLER_BRAND s ON s.BRAND_CODE = p.BRAND_CODE where c.MEMBERIDX = #{memberIdx} offset #{offset} rows fetch first #{size} rows only
